question: Hi, I have been diagnosed as having gastritis.  My problem is with my appetite.  When I eat, I can only eat a little bit at a time.  But my problem is I get hungry very frequently because I can't eat much.  Is there a way I can manage my diet so that I don't get hungry every hour or so?  Also if I ignore my hunger, then my stomach really hurts, that is why I have to keep eating every hour.Please help, I am tired of eating all the time.
title: Gastritis
